articles.content: The Global Astrometric Interferometer for Astrophysics, also called the Gaia observatory, will soon change our understanding of the Milky Way, says the European Space Agency (ESA) which launched the … [+2466 chars]

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: World's largest plant discovered in Australia | News | jacksonprogress-argus.com - jacksonprogress-argus
articles.description: The world's largest living plant has been identified in the shallow waters off the coast of Western Australia, according to scientists.
articles.content:
The world's largest living plant has been identified in the shallow waters off the coast of Western Australia, according to scientists.
